challengeFiles.seed:

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: You should add a form element adjacent the p element.

tests.testString:
// Default action points to window location
assert.notEqual(document.querySelector('form')?.action, window?.location?.href);

tests.text: You should give the action a value of https://register-demo.freecodecamp.org.

description: As suggested by the title, you are creating a form. So, after the p element, insert a form with an action attribute targeting https://register-demo.freecodecamp.org.
